sentence.Network_en: It was my past of unatoned sins.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有我罪孽未赎的过往.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 残忍而美丽的情谊:The&nbsp;Kite&n... ... atone v. 补偿，弥补，赎罪 unatoned adj. 未能弥补的，无法弥补的 sin n. 原罪，罪过，罪恶.
